Preface from the book

The writing of this book has been encouraged by the Association for 
Canadian Studies in the United States (ACSUS). Like ACSUS, it is

States.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Given the widespread comparisons between the two countries, 
this volume is suitable for use in Introduction to Canada courses in the 
United States and Introduction to American Studies courses in Canada. The need for a comprehensive introductory book about Canada 
was endorsed at the ACSUS biennial in 2005. As editors, we have invited both leading and up-and-coming Canadian Studies educators to 
shape this book and to write chapters. We have endeavoured to make 
the chapter transitions as seamless as possible, in order to provide an 
integrated text rather than a collection of essays.
